website_summaries.verdict: Cool and noiseless protection against bed bugs that also provides water resistance to most liquids.
pros: Soft and breathable, this hypoallergenic mattress encasement fits 9-12 inch thick mattresses
It is easy to put on and take off
Available in four different sizes to fit most beds
Protects against dust mites and allergens
cons: It gets stuck when trying to zip it closed and is hard to unzip as well

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am using a 8" king memory foam mattress and the original cover zipper broke, also there are already tears so i decided to look for a replacement. I found this and it fits just right on my mattress, nice feel and texture to it. Quality looks good, I will update my review if I have any problems with the zipper. Overall this satisfies my needs and I am happy with it, but wait there's more, you get 2 bonus pillow covers lol
customer_reviews.author: dRe'

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Update: Absolutely does not do the job. Disreguard anything the statement below. My fiance was sick last night and this literally did not offer the slightest protection. Very soft and does the job. Update from the last update: After adjusting my review the last time, the seller reached out to make sure my family was okay and offered me a refund. Such amazing customer service 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, fits perfectly on 10” rivet mattress
customer_reviews.text: Initial review day 1: came in perfect packaging and no flaws in the cover. Cover fit amazon rivet king 10” mattress perfectly, no difficulty zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan lam

customer_reviews.title: Update  Seller reached out to me and sent new encasement .Looks and feels great and zipper works .
customer_reviews.text: Fabric feels great Strong and still soft Wish it came with a working zipper Returning
customer_reviews.author: Z Family

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, does what it is.. covers ur bed.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a bed cover, order it... its nothing special, but what I was looking for.. 5 stars, since it is what it is. I don't think I got my pillow cases tho. or maybe i over looked it or zipped in the bed... too lazy to unzip to check
customer_reviews.author: Candy Long

customer_reviews.title: but we seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: have never had a zippered encasement cover before so have nothing to compare to. but we seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: BHD

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality fell apart after 5 months it has holes in it
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 5 minths and there are holes in it
customer_reviews.author: bethany hurst

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Install
customer_reviews.text: The cover is well made BUT it was a bear to put on. In fact my husband said don't ever take it off or if you do pitch it because I won't deal with putting it back on. I will say that our king size double pillow mattress is probably heavier than most mattresses. We have another one to put on a much lighter mattress so that will be the teller.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, not noisy plastic but would contain moisture until you could wipe it up. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable, slipped on easily with 2 people. Wouldn’t purchase a new mattress without immediately putting one of these on. Repeat customer. Nice price point.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON WAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Zipper quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Feels nice but zipper did not hold up after a couple nights of sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoges

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my memory foam king mattress. Zips all ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit my memory foam king mattress. Zips all the way around instead of a fitted sheet,which made things very difficult
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: It fits my pillow top king size bed very well
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: After a 3 weeks of usage it is not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Elamurugu

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome! Very soft and durable! So happy I purchased it! Shipping was super fast and it was very easy to put on. I have a king size mattress and I put it on by myself.
customer_reviews.author: areneex

product_meta.title: DOWNCOOL Zippered Mattress Encasement Cover- Include 2 Bonus Pillowcase- Breathable Six Sided Mattress Protector (9-12 deep, King)
feature_bullets: Soft, Breathable and Hypoallergenic Mattress Encasement Cover: The cloud-like surface made of new material 88% polyester+12% nylon

Cooling and Noiseless Bed Mattress Protection King (78x80 inch) have water resistant (The leaking liquid must be erased immediately) protection without the loud and smelly issues relative to the cheap plastic similar products

Use Details of Mattress Protector: The premium zipper opening makes it pretty easy to put on, especially with 2 people. The encasement cover fit is suitable for 9-12 inch depths mattress and works well with your mattress

Fitted Sheet Design Bedding Mattress Encasement: Surrounds and protects the mattress on all 6-sides against allergens, perspiration and other harmful items. Turn it over to use when top have a permanent mark
GIVEAWAY two piece of matched (20x36Inch) pillowcase cover, Machine washable, 5-Year warranty, Customer satisfaction is our biggest demand. If you are not satisfied, we will give you a full refund

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
